nio/WatsonToneAnalyzer.Description: Takes a peice of text and runs it through Watson's tone analyzer, returning possible emotions of the text with associated confidence values.
nio/WatsonToneAnalyzer.Output: A dictionary of emotions and confidence values
nio/WatsonToneAnalyzer.Input: Any list of signals with text attributes

Data Field.description: An expression that should evaluate to text

nio/WatsonTextToSpeech.Description: This block takes in text and sends it through Watson's text to speech API, outputting a .wav audio file that is the speech of the given text.
nio/WatsonTextToSpeech.Output: A .wav file of the converted text in the specified directory.

Data Field.description: An expression that should evaluate to text

Directory to save audio files.description: location to save converted speech files

Voice.description: A selection of voices to choose from when synthesizing the input text

nio/WatsonSpeechToText.Description: This block reads a .wav file and sends it through Watson's speech to text API, returning a dictionary of the recognized speech form the audio file, along with alternative interpretations with confidence values.
nio/WatsonSpeechToText.Output: A dictionary of the recognized speech form the audio file, along with alternative interpretations with confidence values.
nio/WatsonSpeechToText.Input: A .wav file on the local machine.
